subject: non-delivery of items
description_text:
I need a refund for 3 quick releases that were never delivered. SSN3540 AND
SSN3336
Your company did not deliver 3 of these quick releases and you have not
communicated with me. I need a full refund immediately for all 3 plus
shipping charges. I do not want promises I need a refund.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8712 中
